item.title: Build a real-time stream of air quality data with Apache Kafka
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: Let’s build a data stream with Kafka today! We will retrieve air quality data using the World Air Quality Index project’s API, then push it on a Kafka cluster.
